Package de.mpg.aai.shhaa.config

Interface Summary
Configurable simple one-method-interface to indicate implementing classes as configurable
 

Class Summary
ConfigContext holds configuration context data (config file location, the loaded config), invokes loading the config and building the services
ConfigContextListener  
ConfigLoader loads the configuration from the config file
Configuration represents the actual configuration, loaded from the config file
ServiceLoader service factory: loads the services as specified in the configuration
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationException exception indicates configuration issues
